content: The hours of operation for the dining options at UCLA vary. Some of the dining halls are open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, while others may only be open for certain meal times or have limited hours of operation. Some options offer late-night hours for students who need a snack or meal outside of regular meal times. Additionally, some dining locations on campus may be closed on weekends or holidays, while others extend their hours to accommodate students who are studying late or have events on campus. Overall, students at UCLA have access to a variety of dining options with flexible hours to fit their schedules.
